1853 
1872 static inline
1873 void RAIL_CopyRxPacket(uint8_t *pDest,
1874  const RAIL_RxPacketInfo_t *pPacketInfo)
1875 {
1876  memcpy(pDest, pPacketInfo->firstPortionData, pPacketInfo->firstPortionBytes);
1877  if (pPacketInfo->lastPortionData != NULL) {
1878  memcpy(pDest + pPacketInfo->firstPortionBytes,
1879  pPacketInfo->lastPortionData,
1880  pPacketInfo->packetBytes - pPacketInfo->firstPortionBytes);
1881  }
1882 }
